properties.name: slm.remember-me.key
properties.description: A private key to prevent modification of the remember-me token.

properties.name: slm.remember-me.token-validity-seconds
properties.description: The date and time when the remember-me token expires, expressed in milliseconds.

properties.name: slm.remember-me.use-secure-cookie
properties.description: A cookie with the Secure attribute is only sent to the server with an encrypted request over the HTTPS protocol.
